title: Kindred Causing Flashing Colours.
body: Kindred is causing the game to flash colours for the duration of the game. Not exactly what about Kindred that's causing this, but it's only happened with her in the match. So far it's only started up halfway through the match and then it has lasted for the remainder of the match.

replies.body:
Morning RaiPhantom! :D 

Thanks for the report! We're in the process of investigating. If you experience this again and can grab a screenshot or have any additional repro steps, it'd be wicked helpful. ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=WcWFamFP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-18T18:26:28.103+0000)
>
> Morning RaiPhantom! :D 
> 
> Thanks for the report! We're in the process of investigating. If you experience this again and can grab a screenshot or have any additional repro steps, it'd be wicked helpful. ^-^

Thank you!
